head.title: July 23-29; North Korea Finds Softer Stances in the West

hedline.hl1: July 23-29; North Korea Finds Softer Stances in the West

block.p: North Korea does indeed seem to be coming out of its shell. In the highest-level talks between the United States and North Korea since the Korean War, Secretary of State Madeleine K. Albright met with Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun. New Zealand and Canada said they were normalizing relations with North Korea.

North Korea does indeed seem to be coming out of its shell. In the highest-level talks between the United States and North Korea since the Korean War, Secretary of State Madeleine K. Albright met with Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun. New Zealand and Canada said they were normalizing relations with North Korea.
